data.title: Mayank Anand
data.meta_description: Profile and biography of Mayank Anand
data.text:
Mayank Anand Biography

Mayank Anand is a multifaceted personality associated with Hindi television industry. He is a former model, an actor, TV host and director, apart from a writer and designer artist. He is married to popular actress of small screen, Shraddha Nigam since 2013. Both are actors turned fashion designers. Mayank is a good painter as well. “Hello Dollie”, “Hotel Kingston”, “Naaginn” and “Dill Mill Gayye” are some of his popular roles on television as an actor. He became extremely popular through the show, “Dill Mill Gayye” where he played the role of Doctor Rahul Garewal. He was paired with Drashti Dhami for the show.

A multi-tasker, Mayank is a good painter, poet, TV anchor and play director, besides fashion designing. He along with his wife Shraddha Nigam has launched a fashion label together at the Lakme Fashion Week held at Mumbai. They exhibited their collection in the 23rd Lakme fashion week for winter 2014 season held at Hotel Palladium in Mumbai. Shraddha is fully concentrating into her career as a fashion designer as she is not interested in doing routine television soaps. They met on television sets and fell in love for each other. Shraddha was earlier married to noted television actor Karan Singh Grover, who is now a Bollywood actor.

Mayank is very much interested in arts, and is regular into shows and art exhibitions held at Mumbai city. The artist had lots of ups and downs in his life and had always taken things positively. He had withstood many rumours related to his love life. The happily married couple feels that they are made for each other. They share many interests in common and also share a mutual dislike for reality TV shows.

Published: N/A
